00107 #define FUBOUNDINGBOX_COORDINATE_COUNT 8
00108 #define FUBOUNDINGBOX_COORDINATES(coordinates, boundingBox) \
00109     FMVector3 coordinates[FUBOUNDINGBOX_COORDINATE_COUNT] = { \
00110         boundingBox.GetMin(), \
00111         FMVector3(boundingBox.GetMin().x, boundingBox.GetMin().y, boundingBox.GetMax().z), \

00116         FMVector3(boundingBox.GetMax().x, boundingBox.GetMax().y, boundingBox.GetMin().z), \
